notes: Replaced the placeholder concierge UI with the luxury chatbot component while keeping the Dentally booking CTA intact.
Mapped the runtime concierge engine calls to the existing /health and /v1/converse endpoints used by the placeholder wiring, including timeout handling.
Introduced local easing constants and removed _imports-only dependencies so the component compiles inside apps/chat-ui.
Added global chat-preview styles and public manifest assets under apps/chat-ui to match the luxury UI presentation.
